UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's public and private profile information.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

name.description: The user's full name or company name.

role.description: The role of the user, determining their permissions and view.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user profile was created.

Job.title: Job
Job.description: Represents a collaboration contract between a Brand and a Creator.

campaignBrief.description: Detailed description of the campaign, goals, and requirements.

deliverables.description: A list of specific deliverables required from the creator.

price.description: The payment amount for the job in Moroccan Dirhams (DH).

brandId.description: The UID of the Brand who created the job.

creatorId.description: The UID of the Creator assigned to the job.

status.description: The current status of the job workflow.

CampaignApplication.title: Campaign Application
CampaignApplication.description: Represents a Creator's application to a specific campaign.

jobId.description: The ID of the job this application is for.

creatorId.description: The UID of the Creator who is applying.

brandId.description: The UID of the Brand who owns the job.

coverLetter.description: The creator's message to the brand for this application.

definition.description: Stores public and private information for each user.
